mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER_DROP(NUM, EMAIL, NICKNAME) value (MEMBER_DROP_SEQ.nextval, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{warnCount})
mapper.select: select count(*) from MEMBER_DROP where EMAIL=#{email}
select count(*) from MEMBER_DROP where NICKNAME=#{nickname}

select * from MEMBER_DROP
where NICKNAME like '%'||#{nickname}||'%'
